A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It really doesn't go the way you think and that's amazing! The movie faults in one act simply being not as exciting as the rest\, a couple out-of-place jokes\, and one antagonist not ever making smart decisions. Everything else is one fun and incredibly thrilling ride that puts your favorite characters through some tough decision making and developments. The movie left me in wonder and excitement for what's to come in the next film of the trilogy.
